text: Læa cng raluk thung khna thi phracea khx ngxi brxhim di thdsxb khea dwy phra baycha bang prakar læw khea kdi snxng tamph ra baycha nan doy khrbthwn phraxngkh tras wa thæcring kha ca hı cea pen phuna mnusʹy chati khea klaw wa læa cak luk hlan khxng kha phraxngkh dwy phraxngkh tras wa sayya khxng kha nan ca mi dikæ brrda phu xthrrm
